key.name: visualisation-type
key.description: Controls whether audio visualisation occurs in the time domain or frequency domain. 0 = frequency, 1 = time.

key.name: gap-size
key.description: The gap between bars when audio is visualised

key.name: minimum-frequency
key.description: The minimum frequency of audio that will be visualised

key.name: maximum-frequency
key.description: The maximum frequency of audio that will be visualised

key.name: use-bark-scale
key.description: Results in a non-uniform x-axis that better reflects human hearing
